data.name: Wispera
data.detailed_description:
Community


About the Game

Inspired by many crafting survival games, Wispera is a procedural generated, open-world sandbox survival crafting game. Fundamentally Wispera is similar to games like Minicraft and Terraria.



Explore the vast infinity generated world. There are plenty of opportunities to be had when searching for the perfect base location.



Delve deep underground to collect rare materials. I’d recommend you be careful though, you never know what might be lurking deep in the dark.



After a long spelunking trip deep underground, you can use the furnace to smelt down your valuable materials. Use these newly processed materials to craft better armor, tools, and many other items!



Wispera has been designed with a highly efficient tile based world. With the materials you collect you can build walls and floors to create any structure you desire. Among many other items to decorate and outfit your base.



Using your newly crafted tools and armor, fight dangerous monsters to collect rare items!

Some Key Features Include

  • Sandbox survival gameplay with building mechanics.
  • A multitude of unique items to collect and craft.
  • Infinite procedural generation with multiple layers of underground depth.
  • Day and night system.
  • (Coming Soon) Crops and farming.
  • Many unique monsters to find and collect rare items from.
  • Hand written game engine made on top of LibGDX specifically for Wispera.
  • Custom shaders with dithered cloud shadows and lighting effects.
  • ...and many more!

data.short_description: Wispera is a procedurally generated, open-world sandbox survival game. Craft weapons to battle monsters at night, or expand your base and create a safe haven. If you prefer to remain mobile, travel away and explore new places. Whether you’re a monster hunter or a builder, the choice is yours!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0GHZ Clock Speed
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ Supported GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
